Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Reroute at Central Park/31st
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via  Lawndale, 26th, Central Park and 31st, due to street blockage near Central Park/31st.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Austin. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Austin.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
